name: Bruce M. Kapron
content: Bruce Kapron's Home Page Bruce Kapron Professor Computer Science Department University of Victoria Victoria, B.C. CANADA V8W 3P6 Phone: (250) 472-5725 Fax: (250) 472-5708 e-mail: Interests Theory of computing: higher-order computability and complexity, computability and complexity in analysis, symbolic and computational cryptography Because the true perfection of a practical occupation consists not only in knowing the actual performance of the occupation but also in its explanation, why the work is done a in a particular way, and because the art of calculating is a practical occupation, it is clear that it is pertinent to concern oneself with the theory.
